The Christians desire, shewing, how and for what causes a man may desire death. / By William Houghton, preacher at Bicknor in Kent. Houghton, William, preacher at Bicknor in Kent.
[4], 19, [1] p.
Printed by Roger Daniel, for Samuel Cartwright, at the signe of the Bible in Duck-lane, London : 1650.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 23". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
